EmailTemplate.subject: Want to help us pick our NCS staff for 2015?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name}
Remember Your Mentor? Want to pick the NCS staff for 2015? Fancy being a Staffing Assessor?
Get Training and Recruitment experience from our dedicated staffing team.
Sign up to the training on 2nd February @ Manchester Deaf Centre from 6-8pm and then pick assessment dates that suit you. Opportunities for after college, weekends and holidays.
Deadline to apply is midnight on Wednesday 28th January.
Click here
https://docs.google.com/a/the-challenge.org/forms/d/1h3_4Mn9rX0kDvhiTzpfMH7Cc4KWIBJaIrFVjhWcYmhs/viewform?c=0&w=1
to apply.
